reviews.text: Attending the children centre they have a lot of resources for the kids to stay entertained. With a change of different activities each week. My daughter is never bored in attending. The staff are very friendly and welcoming as well as other parents with their kids. Since attending I have noticed growth with my daughters communication and socialising skills as well as other positive areas of development. I would definitely recommend.

They nursery and baby center it’s very nice and clean! Stuff are friendly and very helpful! It makes you feel very welcome and gives you a very good mood to be there! I highly recommend we been going there since my baby was 3 months now he is 2! And this is the nursery he will be going to

I love thé setting, so many good resources for the children, my child is never bored when attending sessions. It has set her up for when she goes nursery, she is gaining more independence. However the staff there are also very engaging and friendly, they interact with all the children and makes them all feel special.

I am extremely happy with the services ,the support and attention the staff always giving to me and my children. Also visiting the children centre helped me to improve my confidence and communication skills with new people(parents), which influenced my children's development too.
I highly recommend to all families to visit the sessions with children under 5's.

I highly recommend RebeccaCheetham Nursery and Childers centre. I know them for about 4 years when I first start going to the Children's centre sessions with my son. The staff is always very  friendly and helpful. My son was always very happy attending Nursery and that tells me how good they were treating him. I have to say that they do a great job encouraging children to learn in a fun way.

address: Marcus St, London E15 3JT, United Kingdom
